0.title: Modifies provisions relating to the Science, Technology, Engineering and Mathematics Initiative
0.description: Modifies provisions relating to the Science, Technology, Engineering and Mathematics Initiative

2.title: Establishes a statewide STEM career awareness program and creates new provisions of law related to computer science
2.description: Establishes a statewide STEM career awareness program and creates new provisions of law related to computer science

3.title: Informs the Governor and the Senate that the House is convened for the 2018 First Extraordinary Session
3.description: Informs the Governor and the Senate that the House is convened for the 2018 First Extraordinary Session

4.title: Modifies provisions relating to computer science education
4.description: Modifies provisions relating to computer science education

5.title: Urges the Missouri Attorney General to withdraw from Texas v. United States
5.description: Urges the Missouri Attorney General to withdraw from Texas v. United States

6.title: Urges the U.S. Congress to amend federal law to require income tax disclosure by presidential candidates and to require psychological screening for presidential candidates
6.description: Urges the U.S. Congress to amend federal law to require income tax disclosure by presidential candidates and to require psychological screening for presidential candidates

7.title: Urges all Governors and legislative leaders to refrain from scheduling future regular or extraordinary sessions of the Missouri General Assembly on any important religious holidays, such as the Jewish High Holy Days
7.description: Urges all Governors and legislative leaders to refrain from scheduling future regular or extraordinary sessions of the Missouri General Assembly on any important religious holidays, such as the Jewish High Holy Days

8.title: Urges U.S. Senator Claire McCaskill to put forward and support Federal legislation instituting reparations to the Black community
8.description: Urges U.S. Senator Claire McCaskill to put forward and support Federal legislation instituting reparations to the Black community
